meanings.definition: Long locks of hair framing the face, typically worn by Orthodox Jewish men.
meanings.sent1: The Orthodox Jewish man proudly displayed his sidelocks as a symbol of his faith.
meanings.sent2: She decided to grow out her hair and style it into elegant sidelocks.
meanings.sent3: The sidelocks of the man were so long that they almost touched his shoulders.
meanings.sent4: Her sidelocks were like curtains framing her face, adding a touch of elegance to her appearance.
meanings.sent5: The sidelocks of the young boy fluttered in the wind as he ran through the park.

meanings.definition: A hairstyle in which the hair is worn in long locks on either side of the head.
meanings.sent1: The rockstar's signature look included bold sidelocks that set him apart from other musicians.
meanings.sent2: She braided her hair into intricate patterns, with sidelocks cascading down each side of her face.
meanings.sent3: The sidelocks of the toddler made him look like a little prince from a fairy tale.
meanings.sent4: Her sidelocks were like golden rivers flowing down the sides of her head.
meanings.sent5: The sidelocks of the model added a touch of glamour to the fashion show.
